description:
Saionji Sekai is a student in year one of class three who is the antithesis and foil of http://anidb.net/ch2345 [Kotonoha].
A playful and outgoing classmate seated directly next to http://anidb.net/ch2344 [Makoto], she takes a curious interest in him during their first acquaintance, and in every medium of the series, helps to establish his bond with Kotonoha. Though genuinely upbeat, Sekai does occasionally show a more serious side, and when sufficiently frustrated can be loud, selfish, overemotional and even manipulative.
She lives with her mother http://anidb.net/ch41022 [Youko] in the fictional area of Motehara-Sakashita, is part-time employed as a waitress at the family restaurant Radish and is also the best friend of http://anidb.net/ch2347 [Kiyoura Setsuna].
name: Saionji Sekai
